desc: Food Bank For New York City is the city’s largest hunger-relief organization working to end hunger throughout the five boroughs. Shop the Food Bank store to fuel our mission to end hunger in NYC.

layout.text:
Food Bank For New York City’s 2022 Pride Month theme is #ProudlyFed. For us, this means we not only serve the estimated 1 in 5 LGBTQ+ New
Yorkers struggling to put food on the table, but that we do it with joy, love, and pride.
